articles.title: Condemnations mount for Jonathan Glazer's 'morally indefensible' Oscars speech - Euronews
articles.description: The US Holocaust Survivors Foundation has labelled Jonathan Glazer’s Oscars speech “morally indefensible”. The director of the Oscar-winning Holocaust drama 'The Zone of Interest' said those killed in both Israel and Gaza were victims of "dehumanisation".
